item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

Try this code. Please note that I just wrote this code in the post. I have never used it or even tested it so if it doesn’t work, then try modifying it.

if(commands.EqualsIgnoreCase("giveadmin") { String newAdmin = command.substring(10); client nAdmin = (client) server.playerHandler.players[newAdmin]; try { nAdmin.playerRights = 2; player.Disconnected == true; //This kicks the player so the admin will take effect. catch(Exception e){ sendMessage("Couldn't do it. Player isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

If it doesn’t work, sned me a message and ill write one and test it for you until it works.
Hopefully it does work tho

Read full topic
